Package pegasus.graphics

package pegasus.graphics
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractTriangle<V extends Vector<V>>
    The abstract base class for triangles.
    Colors
    Contains utility methods and constant values related to AWT Colors.
    PRenderer
    Contains graphics rendering utilities.
    Triangle<V extends Vector<V>>
    Represents a triangle of arbitrary dimensions.
    Triangle2D
    A two-dimensional triangle.
    Triangle3D
    A three-dimensional triangle.
    Vertex2
    A specialized two-dimensional vector with cached norms for optimal runtime performance.
    Vertex3
    A specialized three-dimensional vector with cached norms for optimal runtime performance.
